author: Simon Difford
description: This drink's sweet-sour balance and degree of pink hue is relative to how generous you are with the grenadine.(When made with homemade fresh pomegranate syrup in place of grenadine, and you hit the perfect balance, this drink is delicious but sadly lacks the eponymous pink hue with the result being more golden-amber.)
name: Pink Palace
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
